articles.author: Saurabh Verma
articles.title: Centre Says 'No' to Same-sex Marriage; A Look at Countries Where It’s Legal | Listicle - News18
articles.description: The US, the United Kingdom, Argentina, Australia, Brazil, Canada, France, Germany, Iceland, Ireland, Mexico, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Taiwan and Uruguay are among the countries where same-sex marriage is legal
articles.content: The Government of India has opposed the legal recognition of same-sex marriages in the country. In an affidavit filed before the Supreme Court, the Centre said same-sex relationships and heterosexual… [+8189 chars]

articles.title: Virat Kohli Slams 186, India Ahead By 88 Runs In Fourth Test Against Australia - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Virat Kohli scored 186 as India ended their first innings at 571 in the fourth and final Test against Australia in Ahmedabad on Sunday
articles.content: Virat Kohli scored 186 as India ended their first innings at 571 in the fourth and final Test against Australia in Ahmedabad on Sunday. At stumps on the fourth day, Australia were three for no loss i… [+1085 chars]
